Title: Relates to the crime of computer tampering in the third degree
Summary: Adds that a person is guilty of computer tampering in the third degree when they intentionally enter or alter in any manner or destroy computer material indicating that a person did or did not receive a vaccination that is reported to the New York state immunization information system or the New York city immunization registry.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of computer tampering in the third degree
